alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 16 at 10:16AM CST until November 17 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow is ongoing. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, with local accumulations of 5 to 7 inches northeast of Castle Danger. * WHERE...Southern Lake County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions today, with rapid reductions in visibility north of Castle Danger. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
